dct_title_s: Map of the island and city of Montreal
dct_alternative_sm: Map of the island and city of Montreal compiled from the latest surveys with all improvements to January, 1881 ; constructed and drawn by J. Johnston.
dct_description_sm: 2 maps on 1 sheet : col. ; 48 x 47 cm and 48 x 53 cm, sheet 58 x 108 cm., folded in cover 21 x 14 cm.
In upper margin: Dawson's complete map of Montreal & vicinity, 1881; Dominion of Canada, Province of Quebec.
Insets: County & railway map of the vicinity of Montreal ; The town and fortifications of Montreal, Ville Marie.
dct_rights_sm: This map is in the public domain. Please attribute access and use of this digitized map to the Stephen S. Clark Library, University of Michigan Library.
